entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
